huntresses.name: Yagyu Jubei Mitsuyoshi
huntresses.skill1: Jubei Yagyu is a self-made swordsman who attacks the enemy with the least HP 4 times, dealing physical damage of 32%/42%/56% of the attack power each time and physical damage to enemies with HP of 0%/30%/50% or less is added by 0%/84%/112%
huntresses.skill2: Yagyu Jubei is a secret sword technique that deals 50%/70%/90% physical damage to all enemies in the row with the largest number of enemies, shoots lightning bolts in that row again, and dealing 100%/120%/140% of her attack in physical DMG.
huntresses.passive1: When Jubei Yagyu defeats an enemy, there is an 80%/80%/100% chance that she will activate the 'Jubei Form' again
huntresses.passive2: Increases Crit by 3%/4%/5% and Dodge by 3%/4%/5%

huntresses.name: Hugo
huntresses.skill1: Hugo hurls miniature bombs at 2 random enemies, dealing 12%/16%/20% of her ATK in Physical DMG and spreading the mini-bombs all over the target's bodies. These will detonate when the targets try to use Ultimate Skills, additionally dealing 8%/12%/16% oft he targets Max HP in True DMG to themselves and adjacent targets.
huntresses.skill2: Hugo shoots at the enemy team deal 60%/80%/100% of her ATK in Physical DMG while immediately detonating the bombs. After the bombs have been detonated by this skill, all exploded targets have a 40%/50%/60% chance to become stunned for 2 turns.
huntresses.passive1: Granted superior insight by her erudite knowledge, Hugo decreases the Tenacity of the enemy team by 6%/8%/10% when in battle.
huntresses.passive2: Expert academician Hugo can contribute to victory with her ability to keenly perceive the power of allies and enemies. Increases her Hit by 3%/4%/5% and her Tenacity by 3%/4%/5%.
huntresses.ee30: While still alive, decreases all enemies' Speed by 5/10/20.

huntresses.name: Minamoto no Yoshitsune
huntresses.skill1: Minamoto no Yoshitsune injects spiritual power at the tip of the arrow, shoots a powerful blow to the column with the largest number of enemies, deals physical damage of 54%/72%/90% of the attack power, increases his attack power by 20%/25%/30%, and lasts for 2 turns.
huntresses.skill2: Minamoto no Yoshitsune prays to Tenjin and randomly shoots 3 arrows to 3 enemies, firing a total of 9 arrows. Inflicts physical damage of 30%/40%/50% of the attack power on the enemy with a single arrow, and preferentially attacks intelligent enemies. Every time you shoot, there is a 30%/60%/100% chance to unlock one enemy buff.
huntresses.passive1: Minamoto no Yoshitsune deals physical damage of 48%/64%/80% of the attack power to the intelligence type huntless, and reduces the magic damage received by 10%/20%/30%.
huntresses.passive2: Minamoto no Yoshitsune can obtain some of the power of Tenjin by offering dance and prayer to Tenjin. Increases your own consensus rate by 3%/4%/5% and your resilience by 3%/4%/5%
huntresses.ee30: When you activate a critical attack, your critical rate increases by 4%/5%/6%, and it overlaps up to 3/4/5 times.

huntresses.name: Richard
huntresses.skill1: Richard orders her army to charge 3 times at the front column of enemies, each dealing 48%/66%/100% of her ATK in Physical DMG and increasing her teams ATK by 15%/20%/25% for 2 turns.
huntresses.skill2: Richard hacks at the enemy 10 times, each dealing 50%/75%,100% of her ATK in Physical DMG to 1 random target. If one of these attacks crits, each Crit recovers 30% of Richards ATK in HP for her surviving teammates.
huntresses.passive1: For every 1 surviving allied huntress, Richards Final DMG Reduce increases by 5%/6%/7%. Cannot be dispelled.
huntresses.passive2: Increases her Crit and Dodge by 3.5%/5%/6%.
huntresses.ee30: In battle, for every surviving allied huntress, own Final DMG increases by 5%/10%/15%. Cannot be dispelled.

huntresses.name: Da Qiao and Xiao Qiao
huntresses.skill1: Da Qiao & Xiao Qia move in tandem, increasing the ATK of huntress with the highest ATK by 36%/48%/60% and decreases the ATK of the enemy huntress with the highest ATK by 36%/48%/60%.
huntresses.skill2: Da Qiao & Xiao Qia dance in sync, increasing all allies' Speed by 15/15/20, Final DMG by 15%/15%/20% and Final DMG Reduce by 0%/15%/20%.
huntresses.passive1: During regular attacks, Da Qiao & Xiao Qiao will each attack a target in turn, each attack dealing 96%/128%/160% of their ATK in Magical DMG.
huntresses.passive2: Increases their HP by 18%/25%/30% and their Tenacity by 3.5%/5%/6%.
huntresses.ee30: At the start of battle, middle and frontline DEF + 30%/60%/100% and the backline Crit + 10%/15%/20% for 2/3/4 turns.

huntresses.name: Shakespeare
huntresses.skill1: Shakespeare wields a sword, attacks a single enemy twice, inflicts physical damage of 48%/64%/80% of the attack power each time, increases his own critical rate by 10%/15%/20%, and lasts for 2 turns.
huntresses.skill2: Shakespeare accumulates power, dealing physical damage of 108%/144%/180% of the attack power to all enemies in the column with the largest number of enemies, and the enemies who have been hit by the critical hit are blown away <Blow off> The blown enemies are In addition, it takes 70% of the attack power of the attacker (this damage cannot be defended)
huntresses.passive1: Shakespeare, encouraged by fans, clears 2 of his condition abnormalities at the beginning of the turn, increases his defense by 30%/60%/90%, and this effect lasts for 2 turns.(Cancels all abnormal conditions of yourself at lvl 3)
huntresses.passive2: Shakespeare seems to have learned emotional control from the experience of the stage. Increases your criti rate by 3%/4%/5% and your defense by 15%/20%/25%
huntresses.ee30: When a normal attack hits the heart, it restores HP equivalent to 150%/200%/300% of the damage dealt.

huntresses.name: Miyamoto Musashi
huntresses.skill1: Miyamoto Musashi attacks a single enemy 3 times each time he pulls out his sword, dealing physical damage of 48%/64%/80% of the attack power each time. Also, his final damage dealt is increased by 10%. The effect can be duplicated up to 10 times and lasts until the end of the battle.
huntresses.skill2: Miyamoto Musashi activates the mystery and attacks the enemy with the highest attack power 4 times, the first 3 attacks deal physical damage of 42% of the attack each time, and the last blow is 252% physical damage
huntresses.passive1: Miyamoto Musashi's avoidance is increased by 30%/50%/70% for 1/1/2 turn after the start of battle.
huntresses.passive2: The mind method of Niten Ichi-ryu swordsmanship sharpens the sense of the whole body when practicing for a long time. Increases your hit rate by 3%/4%/5% and your consensus rate by 3%/4%/5%
huntresses.ee30: When Miyamoto Musashi uses normal attacks, she has 40%/70%/100% to use 'Slash Draw' instead of normal attack, and her Crit increases by 10%/15%/20% at the start of each turn

huntresses.name: Mozart
huntresses.skill1: Mozart uses wind elements to summon a butterfly, dealing magic damage of 96%/128%/160% of the attack power to a single enemy, further increasing its own attack power by 10%/20%/30%, and lasting for 2 turns.
huntresses.skill2: Mozart orders a butterfly that flutters in the air and attacks the enemy 10 times. Inflicts 19%/25%/32% magic damage on each attack and recovers 30%/40%/50% of the total damage done to enemies with your HP.
huntresses.passive1: Mozart recovers 10%/15%/20% of his maximum HP when hit by a critical hit (can be activated up to 2/2/3 times each turn).
huntresses.passive2: Mozart, who enjoys life, is always strong against pressure. Increases your defense by 15%/20%/25% and HP by 15%/20%/25%
huntresses.ee30: Restores 20%/35%/50% of your maximum HP at end of turn

huntresses.name: Dante
huntresses.skill1: Dante creates a jet of dark power to lock the enemy with the lowest Speed in a dark room. During this, any damage taken increases by 50%, and when it is this targets turn to act, they will 133%/160%/200% of Dantes ATK in True DMG before their turn is skipped, afer which the Shackles effect will disappear. Cannot be dispelled.
huntresses.skill2: Dante goes in for the kill against the enemy with the lowest HP% 5 times, each dealing 42%/56%/70% of her ATK in Physical DMG and the final blow dealing 420%/560%/700% of her ATK in Physical DMG if the targets HP is below 30%.
huntresses.passive1: While Dante is alive, she will inflict Death Eulogy on the enemy with the lowest HP% throughout the battle, decreasing the afflicted targets ATK and DEF by 30%. Cannot be dispelled.
huntresses.passive2: Increases her Hit and her Crit by 3.5%/5%/6%.
huntresses.ee30: When 'Guest of the Underworld' is used to defeat an enemy, immediately inflict 'Infernal Shackles' on 1/2/3 random enemies, but dealing only 60%/80%/100% damage

huntresses.name: Sima Yi
huntresses.skill1: Sima Yi swings her dual blades and attacks all front- and middle-row targets with the power of ice and fire, dealing 62%/74%/92% of her ATK in Magical DMG with a 60%/75%/90% chance to add 1 stack of Burn and Frost mark respectively.
huntresses.skill2: Sima Yi forms the elements into the shape of a dragon to deal 168%/224%/280% of her ATK in Magical DMG to all front- and middle-row enemies. If the skill slays any targets in that time, the skill is used again. Can only be used 1 additional time per turn.
huntresses.passive1: Control 1 enemy at the start of each turn. All damage dealt by the controlled target to Sima Yi is decreased by 30%/30%/50%. Level 2 & 3: 30%/50% of the HP lost by the controlled target in that turn is transferred to Sima Yi.
huntresses.passive2: Increases her ATK by 18%/25%/30% and her Crit by 3.5%/5%/6%.
huntresses.ee30: When attacking a target afflicted with a debuff, deal an additional 96%/128%/160% of ATK in damage.
